# Test Fixtures

This directory contains test images and data for automated testing.

## Images

- `test-outfit.jpg` - Sample outfit image for testing recommendations
- `blue-dress.jpg` - Blue dress for color extraction tests
- `invalid-image.txt` - Invalid file for error handling tests

## Data

- `sample-recommendations.json` - Mock recommendation responses
- `sample-user-preferences.json` - Mock user preference data
